articles.description: The fourth series of The Crown has highlighted Princess Diana 's influence to a whole new generation, with eBay revealing new research that shows a surge in searches for looks .
articles.content:
While the eighties is often thought of as the decade that fashion forgot, Princess Diana was often applauded for her statement looks from novelty knits to her love of gingham.
